See also: wieviel

German[edit]

Alternative forms[edit]

  • wieviel (superseded in 1996, but still common)

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˌviːˈfiːl/, /ˈviːˌfiːl/
  • Audio
    		(file)

Determiner[edit]

wie viel

  1. how much; how many

Declension[edit]

  • See viel.

Derived terms[edit]

  • wievielter

Adverb[edit]

wie viel

  1. (fairly rare) how much; how often

Usage notes[edit]

  • Used in some contexts, but more often wie sehr (asking for intensity) or wie oft (asking for frequence).
